scannerCode.desc: SQL binding mechanisms should be used
scannerCode.name: S2077

scannerCode.desc: Values passed to OS commands should be sanitized
scannerCode.name: S2076

scannerCode.desc: Values passed to LDAP queries should be sanitized
scannerCode.name: S2078

scannerCode.desc: Struts validation forms should have unique names
scannerCode.name: S3374

scannerCode.desc: Math operands should be cast before assignment
scannerCode.name: S2184

scannerCode.desc: Credentials should not be hard-coded
scannerCode.name: S2068

scannerCode.desc: Security constraints should be defined
scannerCode.name: S3369

scannerCode.desc: HTTP referers should not be relied on
scannerCode.name: S2089

scannerCode.desc: Neither DES (Data Encryption Standard) nor DESede (3DES) should be used
scannerCode.name: S2278

scannerCode.desc: Pseudorandom number generators (PRNGs) should not be used in secure contexts
scannerCode.name: S2245

scannerCode.desc: Cryptographic RSA algorithms should always incorporate OAEP (Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding)
scannerCode.name: S2277

scannerCode.desc: 'javax.crypto.NullCipher should not be used for anything other than testing
scannerCode.name: S2258

scannerCode.desc: Only standard cryptographic algorithms should be used
scannerCode.name: S2257

scannerCode.desc: SHA-1 and Message-Digest hash algorithms should not be used
scannerCode.name: S2070

scannerCode.desc: Mutable members should not be stored or returned directly
scannerCode.name: S2384

scannerCode.desc: Exit methods should not be called
scannerCode.name: S1147

scannerCode.desc: 'InterruptedException should not be ignored
scannerCode.name: S2142

scannerCode.desc: 'NullPointerException' should not be caught
scannerCode.name: S1696

scannerCode.desc: 'Exception' should not be caught when not required by called methods
scannerCode.name: S2221

scannerCode.desc: Throwable and Error should not be caught
scannerCode.name: S1181

scannerCode.desc: Generic exceptions should never be thrown
scannerCode.name: S00112

scannerCode.desc: Blocks should be synchronized on 'private inal' fields
scannerCode.name: S2445

scannerCode.desc: Locks should be released
scannerCode.name: S2222

scannerCode.desc: Resources should be closed
scannerCode.name: S2095

scannerCode.desc: 'toString()' and 'clone()' methods should not return null
scannerCode.name: S2225

scannerCode.desc: Null pointers should not be dereferenced
scannerCode.name: S2259

scannerCode.desc: '@Deprecated' code should not be used
scannerCode.name: CallToDeprecatedMethod

scannerCode.desc: 'switch' statements should end with default' clauses
scannerCode.name: SwitchLastCaseIsDefaultCheck

scannerCode.desc: Assignments should not be made from within sub-expressions
scannerCode.name: AssignmentInSubExpressionCheck

scannerCode.desc: Multiline blocks should be enclosed in curly braces
scannerCode.name: S2681

scannerCode.desc: Switch cases should end with an unconditional 'break' statement
scannerCode.name: S128

scannerCode.desc: Classes should not be compared by name
scannerCode.name: S1872

scannerCode.desc: Conditions should not unconditionally evaluate to 'TRUE' or to 'FALSE'
scannerCode.name: S2583

scannerCode.desc: Useless 'if(true) \{...\}' and 'if(false)\{...\}' blocks should be removed
scannerCode.name: S1145

scannerCode.desc: Web applications should not have a 'main' method
scannerCode.name: S2653

scannerCode.desc: Class variable fields should not have public accessibility
scannerCode.name: ClassVariableVisibilityChck

scannerCode.desc: 'public static' fields should be constant
scannerCode.name: S1444

scannerCode.desc: Untrusted data should not be stored in sessions
scannerCode.name: S3318

scannerCode.desc: Classes should not be loaded dynamically
scannerCode.name: S2658

scannerCode.desc: 'TODO' tags should be handled
scannerCode.name: S1135

scannerCode.desc: 'FIXME' tags should be handled
scannerCode.name: S1134

scannerCode.desc: Dead stores should be removed
scannerCode.name: S1854

scannerCode.desc: super.finalize() should be called at the end of Object.finalize() implementations
scannerCode.name: ObjectFinalizeOverridenCallsSuperFinalizeCheck

scannerCode.desc: 'instanceof' operators that always return 'true' or 'false' should be removed
scannerCode.name: S1850

scannerCode.desc: Thread.run() should not be called directly
scannerCode.name: S1217

scannerCode.desc: Non-serializable objects should not be stored in 'HttpSession' objects
scannerCode.name: S2441

scannerCode.desc: Classes that override 'clone' should be 'Cloneable' and call 'super.clone()'
scannerCode.name: S1182

scannerCode.desc: 'equals(Object obj)' and 'hashCode()' should be overridden in pairs
scannerCode.name: S1206

scannerCode.desc: Mutable fields should not be 'public static'
scannerCode.name: S2386

scannerCode.desc: 'Object.finalize()' should remain protected (versus public) when overriding
scannerCode.name: S1174

scannerCode.desc: Jump statements should not occur in 'finally' blocks
scannerCode.name: S1143

scannerCode.desc: Fields in a 'erializable' class should either be transient or serializable
scannerCode.name: S1948

scannerCode.desc: Objects should be compared with 'equals()'
scannerCode.name: S1698

scannerCode.desc: Exceptions should not be thrown from servlet methods
scannerCode.name: S1989

scannerCode.desc: Cookies should be 'secure'
scannerCode.name: S2092

scannerCode.desc: Return values should not be ignored wen they contain the operation status code
scannerCode.name: S899

scannerCode.desc: Limited dependence should be placed on operator precedence rules in expressions
scannerCode.name: S864

scannerCode.desc: 'HttpServletRequest.getRequestedSessionId()' should not be used
scannerCode.name: S2254

scannerCode.desc: Equality operators should not be used in 'for' loop termination conditions
scannerCode.name: S888
